price: Enti Yedii bͻhyε no ho nokorε maa wͻn, na Yεgyee wͻn ne wͻn a Yεpε no nkwa, na Yεsεee nsεmͻnedifoͻ no.
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
